issue.title: [Doc] General introduction to archery
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8688](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8688). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- What is archery?
- What system requirements does it have? (like, python version?)
- What do I do if the simple instructions don't work?
